Reviews.Content: loved hotel barcelona times stayed el gothic quarter close compare hotel arts situated literally top beach bars restaurants ideal surprisingly noise heard bussling crowds below hotel loves luxury priced hotel isnt exactly aimed people budgets staff friendly kept clean tidy canters water lemon lime orange slices placed hotel guests free charge bathroom massive art amenities hotel restaurant didnt eat plenty cheaper tasty door step

Reviews.Content: shocking true hotel breakfast provides admitted breakfast whilst accessed duplicate key emptied laptop 2 cameras hard drive 2 cellphones res pictures marriage safari trip doesnt math exactly notifying management robbery bothered demanded 20 minutes event wasnt treated seriousness deserved ritz carlton corporate involved eventually compensated stolen items stolen memories
